WorkItem.Description:
I compiled an application using netoffice with framework 2.0 and deployed on a machine without MS Office installed on it. 

It gives an error at the initialization "ProgId not found for Excel.Application". So can I now use netoffice without MS Office.

Please reply,

Sandeep
WorkItem.Summary: how to use on a system without installing MS Office?

Comments.Message:
Hi Sandeep,

reading the first paragraph of the starting page already answers your question:

".NET Wrapper Assemblies for accessing the following MS Office applications: " (http://netoffice.codeplex.com/)

NetOffice is just a library which wraps you the API of these application to be able to develop independently from the specific Microsoft Office version. It is not a replacement for the Microsoft Office applications. 

So it cannot used without the installed Office applications.

Best regards
